%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW staff_cost

     AS

SELECT
    h.pers_no as staff_number,
    h.ps_group as grade, 
	h.annual_salary as salary, 
    cast(cast(h.annual_salary as float)/(365.0*7.4) as float) as hourly_rate
    -- cast(case sign(datediff(dd, cast(le.[Ded# from] as date), @file_date)) -- harmonised.leave_entitlement  LeaveYearStart
	-- 			when 1 then le.[Ded# from]
	-- 			when 0 then le.[Ded# from]
	-- 			else dateadd(year, -1, le.[Ded# from])
	-- 		end as date) as leave_start_date,

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_saphr h
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_leave_entitlement_dim le on h.pers_no = case left(cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10)), 1)
                                                            when 4 then '50' + cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10))
                                                            when 5 then '00' + cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10))
                                                            else cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10))
                                                        end
WHERE
    le.AbsenceQuotaType = 'Annual Leave / P&P';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW carried_over
    
    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    h.pers_no as staff_number,
    case sign(le.LeaveDaysPerYear - 148)
        when 1 then 148
        when 0 then 148
        else le.LeaveDaysPerYear
    end as carried_over_hours

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_saphr h
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_leave_entitlement_dim le on h.pers_no = case left(cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10)), 1)
                                                                            when 4 then '50' + cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10))
                                                                            when 5 then '00' + cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10))
                                                                            else cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10))
                                                                        end
WHERE
    le.AbsenceQuotaType = 'Brought Forward';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW leave_taken

     AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    h.pers_no as staff_number,
    case sign(le.number - 148)
        when 1 then 148
        when 0 then 148
        else le.number
    end as carried_over_hours

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_saphr h
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_absences f ON h.pers_no = f.staff_number
LEFT JOIN staff_cost l ON f.staff_number = l.staff_number
LEFT JOIN carried_over co ON f.staff_number = co.staff_number
WHERE 
    f.Attendance_or_Absence_Type IN ('PT Annual / P&P Leave', 'FT Annual / Priv Leave')
    AND 
    f.AbsenceStartDate BETWEEN l.leave_start_date AND @file_date -- or may be AbsenceEndDate
GROUP BY 
    h.pers_no;

- Missing leave_entitlement.file_name
- Confirm if we need to use views or tables for vw_leaves and vw_absences
- Confirm if f.absence_date is AbsenceStartDate or AbsenceEndDate
- Confirm that Number field is actually le.number

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW sap_hr_historic

     AS
	 
SELECT 
	h.pers_no,
	[First name]
	,[Last name]
	,[Employee No#]
	,[CoCd]
	,[Company Code]
	,[PA]
	,[Personnel Area]
	,[PSubarea]
	,[Personnel Subarea]
	,[Org#unit]
	,[Organizational Unit]
	,[Organizational key]
	,[Organizational Key1]
	,[WorkC]
	,[Work Contract]
	,[CT]
	,h.[Contract Type]
	,[PS group]
	,[Pay Band Description]
	,h.[FTE]
	,[Wk#hrs#]
	,[Indicator Part-Time Employee]
	,[S]
	,[Employment Status]
	,[Gender Key]
	,[TRA Start Date]
	,[TRA End Date]
	,[TRA Status]
	,[TRA Grade]
	,[Prev#PersNo#]
	,[ActR]
	,[Reason for Action]
	,[Position]
	,[Position1]
	,[Cost Ctr]
	,[Cost Centre]
	,[Civil Service Start]
	,[Date to Current Job]
	,[Seniority Date]
	,[Date to Subst# Grade]
	,[Pers#No#1]
	,[Name of Manager (OM)]
	,[Manager Position]
	,[Manager Position Text]
	,[Counter Sign Manager]
	,[Loc#]
	,[Location]
	,[Org Start Date]
	,[Fix Term End Date]
	,[Loan Start Date]
	,[Loan End Date]
	,[EEGrp]
	,[Employee Group]
	,[Annual salary]
	,[Curr#]
	,[NI number]
	,[Birth date]
	,[Age of employee]
	,[EO]
	,[Ethnic origin]
	,[NID]
	,[Rel]
	,[Religious Denomination Key]
	,[SxO]
	,[Wage Type]
	,[Employee Subgroup]
	,[LOA Abs Type]
	,[LOA Absence Type Text]
	,[Scheme reference]
	,[Pension Scheme Name]
	,[Disability Code]
	,[Disability Text]
	,[Disability Code Description]
	,[PArea]
	,[Payroll Area]
	,[Assignment Number]
	,[FTE(2)]
	,[Report_MonthEnd_Date]
	,isnull(sc.leave_allowance, 0) + isnull(co.carried_over_hours, 0) as leave_entitlement_hrs
	,isnull(lt.leave_hours_taken, 0) as leave_taken_hrs
	,round((isnull(sc.leave_allowance, 0) + isnull(co.carried_over_hours, 0) - isnull(sc.expected_leave_hours_remaining, 0)  - isnull(lt.leave_hours_taken, 0)), 2) as leave_remaining_hours
	,isnull(round(sc.expected_leave_hours_remaining, 2), 0) as leave_remaining_prorata_hours
	--,isnull(round((isnull(sc.leave_allowance, 0) + isnull(co.carried_over_hours, 0) - isnull(sc.expected_leave_hours_remaining, 0)  - isnull(lt.leave_hours_taken, 0)) * (sc.hourly_rate) * (1 + p.Total), 2),0.0) as cost_untaken_al
from load.SAP_HR h
	left join staff_cost sc on h.Pers#No# = sc.staff_number
	left join carried_over co on sc.staff_number = co.staff_number
	left join leave_taken lt on sc.staff_number = lt.staff_number
	left join bis.pension_ernic_rates p on sc.grade = p.Grade -- good
where 
	right(cast(Report_MonthEnd_Date as varchar(10)),5) in ('01-31','02-28','02-29','03-31','04-30','05-31','06-30','07-31','08-31','09-30','10-31','11-30','12-31')
